movies.title: The Venture Bros.
movies.Plot: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

movies.title: BoJack Horseman
movies.Plot: BoJack Horseman was the star of the hit television show "Horsin' Around" in the '80s and '90s, but now he's washed up, living in Hollywood, complaining about everything, and wearing colorful sweaters.

movies.title: BoJack Horseman Christmas Special: Sabrina's Christmas Wish
F is for Family
movies.Plot: Follow the Murphy family back to the 1970s, when kids roamed wild, beer flowed freely and nothing came between a man and his TV.

movies.title: Disenchantment
movies.Plot: Princess Tiabeanie, 'Bean', is annoyed at her imminent arranged marriage to Prince Merkimer. Then she meets Luci, a demon, and Elfo, an elf, and things get rather exciting, and dangerous.

movies.title: Big Mouth
movies.Plot: Teenage friends find their lives upended by the wonders and horrors of puberty.

movies.title: The Guardians of Justice
movies.Plot: When their seemingly fearless leader self-destructs, a team of troubled superheroes must confront festering evil in the world - and in themselves.

movies.title: Neo Yokio
movies.Plot: Mourning the death of a recent relationship, an elegant and fashionable demon hunter struggles to stay afloat in the elite society of Neo Yokio.

movies.title: Love, Death & Robots
movies.Plot: A collection of animated short stories that span various genres including science fiction, fantasy, horror and comedy.

movies.title: America: The Motion Picture
movies.Plot: A chainsaw-wielding George Washington teams with beer-loving bro Sam Adams to take down the Brits in a tongue-in-cheek riff on the American Revolution.

movies.title: Paradise PD
movies.Plot: Animated series about bad cops. Not bad as in corrupt, bad as in under-performing. They aren't first responders, they are the worst responders.

movies.title: Cannon Busters
movies.Plot: Explore fantastic land of Gearbolt as we follow a motley crew of travelers on an unforgettable journey to reunite 2 best friends.

movies.title: Tuca & Bertie
movies.Plot: The story of two 30-year old bird women who live in the same apartment building.

movies.title: Aggretsuko
movies.Plot: Frustrated with her thankless office job, the 25-year-old red panda copes with her daily struggles by belting out heavy metal karaoke after work.

movies.title: Super Drags
movies.Plot: Three gay co-workers at a department store lead double lives as superhero drag queens, fighting crime and other forces like an evil drag queen and a conservative politician.

movies.title: Trailer Park Boys: The Animated Series
movies.Plot: Nova Scotia's favorite miscreants have always been super sketchy. Now, carrying on from the Season 12 finale, the boys have become complete cartoons.

movies.title: Solar Opposites
movies.Plot: A family of aliens move to middle America, where they debate whether life is better there or on their home planet.

movies.title: Agent Elvis
movies.Plot: Elvis trades in his jumpsuit for a jetpack when he joins a secret government spy program to help battle the dark forces that threaten the country.

movies.title: RESIDENT EVIL: Infinite Darkness
movies.Plot: Federal agent Leon S. Kennedy teams up with TerraSave staff member Claire Redfield to investigate a zombie outbreak. Based on the popular video game series of the same name by Capcom.

movies.title: The Midnight Gospel
movies.Plot: Traversing trippy worlds inside his universe simulator, a space caster explores existential questions about life, death, and everything in between.

movies.title: Inside Job
movies.Plot: Takes a closer look at what brought about the 2008 financial meltdown.

movies.title: Pacific Rim: The Black
movies.Plot: After Kaiju ravage Australia, two siblings pilot a Jaeger to search for their parents, encountering new creatures, seedy characters and chance allies.

movies.title: Hoops
movies.Plot: Centers on a hot-headed, foul-mouthed high school basketball coach who thinks turning around his godawful team will take him to the "big leagues."

movies.title: Aggretsuko: We Wish You a Metal Christmas
The Liberator
movies.Plot: The true story of one of the bloodiest battles of World War II.

movies.title: Q-Force
movies.Plot: A handsome secret agent and his team of LGBTQ superspies embark on extraordinary adventures.

movies.title: Entergalactic
movies.Plot: Jabari, a charming, streetwear-clad artist on the cusp of real success. After a chance run-in with his cool new photographer neighbor, Meadow, Jabari has to figure out whether he can make space for love in his life.

movies.title: Chicago Party Aunt
movies.Plot: Follows Diane Dunbrowski who is always the life of the party, and also known as the "Chicago Party Aunt".

movies.title: Black Is Beltza
movies.Plot: Oct. 1965. Pamplona's troupe of giant figures, is invited to parade in NY. But not all of them will be allowed to appear: due to racial discrimination, the American authorities will ban the participation of the two black giants.

movies.title: Adventure Beast
movies.Plot: A brave zoologist, his spunky niece and anxious assistant explore the world while saving wild beasts in this adult animated educational-comedy series.

movies.title: Human Resources
movies.Plot: N/A

movies.title: Captain Fall
movies.Plot: A wet-behind-the-ears, yet good-hearted sea captain unwittingly finds himself at the helm of a smuggling ship for a terrible international cartel who's using him as a fall guy in case the authorities ever catch up to them.

movies.title: Saturday Morning All Star Hits!
movies.Plot: Follows Skip and Treybor as they celebrate all that is 80s and 90s television.

movies.title: I Lost My Body
movies.Plot: A story of Naoufel, a young man who is in love with Gabrielle. In another part of town, a severed hand escapes from a dissection lab, determined to find its body again.

movies.title: BLUE EYE SAMURAI
movies.Plot: Driven by a dream of revenge against those who made her an outcast in Edo-period Japan, a young warrior cuts a bloody path toward her destiny.

movies.title: Scott Pilgrim Takes Off
movies.Plot: Scott Pilgrim meets the girl of his dreams, Ramona Flowers, only to find out her seven evil exes stand in the way of their love.

movies.title: Twilight of the Gods
movies.Plot: Animated series inspired by Norse Mythology. The Twilight of the Gods refers events that led to the destruction of Midgard and Asgard, then the death of most of the Æsir and Vanir gods in an ultimate battle against evil, the force...

movies.title: Scissor Seven
movies.Plot: Seeking to recover his memories, a scissor-wielding hairdresser, bungling quasi-assassin stumbles into a struggle for power among three feuding factions.

movies.title: The House
movies.Plot: Across different eras, a poor family, an anxious developer and a fed-up landlady become tied to the same mysterious house in this animated dark comedy.

movies.title: Ne Zha
movies.Plot: Born with unique powers, a boy is recruited to fight demons and save the community that fears him.

movies.title: Masameer - The Movie
movies.Plot: A child with a knack for AI decided to change the world by creating crime-fighting heroes out of her unlikely friends.

movies.title: Mulligan
movies.Plot: N/A

movies.title: Terminator Zero
movies.Plot: A warrior from a post-apocalyptic future travels to 1997 to protect an AI scientist being hunted by an unfeeling and indestructible cyborg.

movies.title: Bee and PuppyCat
movies.Plot: Bee, an unemployed woman, is living a normal life until a grumpy companion named PuppyCat arrives. Follow Bee and and PuppyCat as they travel between reality and "Fishbowl Space."

movies.title: Farzar
movies.Plot: Prince Fichael and his crew as they venture out of their domed human city to fight the evil aliens that want to kill them. As they begin their journey, Fichael quickly discovers that all is not what it seems and he may be living a...

movies.title: Bombay Rose
movies.Plot: BOMBAY ROSE is a beautiful hand-painted animation created by award winning animator Gitanjali Rao. Amidst the bustle of a magnetic and multifaceted city, the budding love between two dreamers is tested by duty and religious divides.

movies.title: Bad Exorcist
movies.Plot: Boner and his crew must rescue Santa on Christmas Eve when a demon determined to steal all of his presents raids a school assembly and kidnaps him.

movies.title: Tear Along the Dotted Line
movies.Plot: A cartoonist in Rome with his armadillo-for-a-conscience reflects on his path in life and a would-be love as he and his friends travel outside the city.

movies.title: Good Times
movies.Plot: The Evans family must manage the challenges of contemporary life, like social issues.

movies.title: Splinter Cell: Deathwatch
movies.Plot: In the shadowy world of espionage, Sam Fisher is a rumor and a legend. Pulled back into action, he must help a new recruit unravel a global conspiracy.

movies.title: Captain Laserhawk: A Blood Dragon Remix
movies.Plot: Year 1992. The United States has been renamed Eden, a technocracy dominated by corruption. Super soldier Dolph Laserhawk is locked up in the Supermaxx maximum security prison. He leads a team of rebels under the orders of a shady ...

movies.title: Skull Island
movies.Plot: A group of shipwrecked characters attempt to escape from an island inhabited by horrifying monsters, including the giant primate who rules the island: Kong.

movies.title: If Anything Happens I Love You
movies.Plot: In the aftermath of tragedy, two grieving parents journey through an emotional void as they mourn the loss of a child.

movies.title: Cops and Robbers
movies.Plot: This animated short film is inspired by a spoken word poetry video created in response to the murder of Ahmaud Arbery.

movies.title: Tomb Raider: The Legend of Lara Croft
movies.Plot: Thrust into a high-stakes chase around the world, fearless adventurer Lara Croft confronts her traumatic past while unraveling an ancient mystery.

movies.title: New Gods: Nezha Reborn
movies.Plot: A normal young deliveryman Li Yunxiang, though coming from the slum area, is living a satisfying life but when the arrogant wealthy son of Boss beats him down, his deep anger turns into a blast of Truth Fire.

movies.title: Arcane
movies.Plot: N/A

movies.title: Castlevania: Nocturne
movies.Plot: During the French Revolution, vampire hunter prodigy Richter Belmont fights to uphold his family's legacy and prevent the rise of a ruthless, power-hungry vampire.

movies.title: Masameer County
movies.Plot: A humorous view on a changing Saudi, this season includes stories about a global media war, a long-standing tribal feud and a health craze gone too far.

movies.title: The Summit of the Gods
movies.Plot: A photojournalist's obsessive quest for the truth about the first expedition to Mt. Everest leads him to search for an esteemed climber who went missing.

movies.title: Adam by Eve: A live in Animation
movies.Plot: Anime, live action and music by cutting-edge artist Eve - all weave together into this dreamlike sonic experience inspired by the story of Adam and Eve.

movies.title: Exploding Kittens
movies.Plot: An eternal conflict reaches epic proportions when both God and the Devil are sent to Earth in the bodies of chunky house cats.

movies.title: The Witcher: Sirens of the Deep
movies.Plot: Hired to probe seaside village attacks, mutant monster hunter Geralt unravels an age-old conflict between humans and sea people that threatens war between kingdoms. Aided by allies, he must solve the mystery before hostilities esc...

movies.title: Green Snake
movies.Plot: Animated adaptation of the classic Chinese folktale. Sequel to the 2019 film 'White Snake'.

movies.title: Devil May Cry
movies.Plot: When a mysterious villain threatens to open the gates of Hell, a devilishly handsome demon hunter could be the world's best hope for salvation.

movies.title: This World Can't Tear Me Down
movies.Plot: When an old friend returns to the neighborhood, Zerocalcare wants to help him find his place back in the world. But what's the right thing to do?

movies.title: Lost in Starlight
movies.Plot: When an astronaut leaves Earth for Mars, the vast infinite space divides star-crossed lovers.

movies.title: Haunted Hotel
movies.Plot: A single mom with two kids operates a haunted hotel, aided by her late brother's ghost who believes they can have ingenious ideas despite his ethereal state.

movies.title: Long Story Short
movies.Plot: A dysfunctional family's shared history, inside jokes, and old wounds are explored in this adult animated comedy spanning multiple years.

movies.title: Masameer Junior
movies.Plot: After a dire lesson on bad behavior, three unruly six-year-olds embark on a chaotic quest for the ultimate "good deed" unleashing mayhem at every turn.

movies.title: Krish, Trish & Baltiboy Bharat Hain Hum
movies.Plot: The beloved trio of animals storytellers relates the stirring history of The Freedom Struggle of India through real-life tales of courage and sacrifice.

movies.title: The Missing
movies.Plot: When an alien comes back to take him, a mouthless young man's life twists and turns as his memories untangle.

movies.title: They Shot the Piano Player
movies.Plot: A New York music journalist goes on a quest to uncover the truth behind the mysterious disappearance of a young Brazilian piano virtuoso in Argentina.

movies.title: Scavengers Reign
movies.Plot: The crew of a damaged deep space freighter are stranded on a beautiful but dangerous planet.

movies.title: The Braid of Time
movies.Plot: Estela is a bright, 23-year-old Black Latina born and raised in Washington, D.C. She is busy DJing and building her own app when she is called to a magical journey of self-discovery by the spirit of her grandmother, Goya. With Goyita

movies.title: Ostinato
movies.Plot: Inspired by writer Sunita Balsara's experience with tinnitus, Ostinato follows Nuha, a composer who sees the world as a vibrant soundscape. She is having the best and gentlest kind of morning when her playing is interrupted by a m...

movies.title: The Amazing Digital Circus
movies.Plot: A woman finds herself trapped in a virtual circus where she and five other humans are subject to the whims of wacky AI. In this digital purgatory they must face frightening NPCs and cope with their own personal traumas.

movies.title: Pantheon
movies.Plot: A young woman starts to get messages from an unknown number that claims to be her deceased father. Trying to uncover the truth, she stumbles upon a larger conspiracy involving the singularity.

movies.title: Piece by Piece
movies.Plot: A vibrant journey through the life of Pharrell Williams, told through the lens of LEGO animation.

movies.title: Fixed
movies.Plot: Bull, an average, all-around good dog, discovers he's going to be neutered in the morning. He realizes he needs one last adventure with his pack of buddies, as these are the last 24 hours with his balls. What could go wrong?

movies.title: Panji Tengkorak
movies.Plot: A fictional world in the early 15th century, when a war of attrition rages. Panji, a warrior who has not found peace even though he has avenged his wife's death. He tries to end his life, but his black magic prevents him.

movies.title: Kurukshetra: The Great War of Mahabharata
Mahavatar Narsimha
movies.Plot: The demon Hiranyakashyap seeks revenge on Vishnu and declares himself a god. His son Prahlad remains devoted to Vishnu. Vishnu manifests as Narsimha to defeat the demon and restore balance.
